content.rendered:
Your Success Story Begins Today

Play
Play
Previous
Next

Master
Consultant

Master Consultant is a groundbreaking concept of A&A associates providing out-of-the-box services for the business. With master consultants, we’re bringing you the expertise and knowledge of our entire team, combined with the personal touch that comes from working one-on-one with an expert who truly knows your industry.

All our consultants undergo rigorous training and evaluation processes before they become Master Consultants. Hence our Master Consultants are people who are seasoned in their fields. They offer a well-researched, highly customized solution for your business to break out of the mold and help you succeed in ways that have never been done before.

When you approach us for any support or solution for your business activity a Master consultant will be assigned to your project, and they will work with you from beginning to end. Your success is our ultimate goal anytime, every time.

The Packages We Offer

Choose The Best Jurisdictions

Package

AED 5,500
  • 100% ownership
  • 0% income and corporate tax
  • 5 business activities
  • Free business address
  • FREE company stamp
  • No Hidden Charges
Inquire Now

 

Package

AED 12,900
  • 100% ownership
  • 0% income and corporate tax
  • 5 business activities
  • Free business address
  • FREE company stamp
  • No Hidden Charges
Inquire Now

 

Get a free ConsultationFor all your enquires

Launching
The Master Consultant

Play Video

Why We are the Number One Consultant

Business Setup

A&A Associate has the expertise and finesse required to assist our clients in all matters related to business setup in Dubai, from selecting the right jurisdiction to obtaining the business license in hand. We go above and beyond for our clients to ensure only the best every time.

Auditing
Having successfully completed more than 5000 Audits in the UAE, A&A Associate is well versed in every Accounting service pertinent to the country’s business empire. A precise audit report is quintessential in business license renewal and other related procedures.
Accounting
We offer a wide range of Accounting services including bookkeeping, Account reconciliation services, financial reporting, and payroll services among many others. Our dedicated team of chartered accountants is readily available to cater to every business vertical.
Legal
Our top-rated legal practice gives an exemplary quality of legal consulting services that do not limit themselves to business disputes only. Our expertise in national and international laws allows us to help clients from all over the globe to navigate precisely through the carefully construed UAE legalities.
ICV Certification
Each business entity that wishes to participate in a tender with ADNOC or any linked party must now get an ICV certificate. We are able to create more employment opportunities for UAE nationals in the private sector and are one of the most preferred firms in the UAE for arranging prompt ICV certification services.
Liquidation
Just like tending to all your business needs while establishing the company, we help in professional liquidation once the company has outlived its existence. We can lend our world-class expertise to the financial valuation of your assets so that you get your money’s worth.

What clients talk about us?
